panels.description: Whether Prometheus startup was fully completed and the server is ready for normal operation.
panels.title: Prometheus Ready

panels.description: Whether the last configuration reload attempt was successful.
panels.title: Configuration Reload

panels.description: Number of scrape pool targets.
panels.title: Targets

panels.description: Total user and system CPU time.
panels.title: CPU Usage %

panels.description: The number of alertmanagers discovered and active.
panels.title: Active Alertmanagers

panels.description: The maximum p99 duration for a rule to execute.
panels.title: Rule Execution

panels.description: Oldest timestamp value stored in the database.
panels.title: Oldest Value

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description:
State of the query log.
https://prometheus.io/docs/guides/query-log/
panels.title: Query Log

panels.description: Last successful configuration reload.
panels.title: Configuration Reload Time

panels.description: The number of bytes that are currently used for local storage by all blocks.
panels.title: Local Storage

panels.description: Resident memory size.
panels.title: RAM Usage

panels.description: Total number of alerts sent.
panels.title: Sent Alerts [10m]

panels.description: The maximum p99 duration of rule group evaluations.
panels.title: Rule Group Evaluation

panels.description: The current number of queries being executed or waiting.
panels.title: Active Queries

panels.description: The number of query log failures.
panels.title: Log Failures

panels.description: Total user and system CPU time of Prometheus process.
panels.title: Prometheus CPU Usage %

panels.description: Resident memory size of Prometheus process
panels.title: Prometheus RAM Usage

panels.description: Total number of alerts sent in 10 minutes periods.
panels.title: Sent Alerts [10m]

panels.description: The number of alertmanagers discovered and active.
panels.title: Active Alertmanagers

panels.description: The number of alert notifications in the queue.
panels.title: Notification Queue

panels.description: Errors sending alert notifications.
panels.title: Alert Errors

panels.description: The total number of template text expansions.
panels.title: Template Expansions

panels.description: The total number of template text expansion failures.
panels.title: Template Failures

panels.description: Alerts dropped due to errors when sending to Alertmanager.
panels.title: Dropped Alerts

panels.description: Total number of series in the head block.
panels.title: # of Series

panels.description: Total number of series created/removed in the head
panels.title: Series Churn

panels.description: Minumum and maximum timestamp of the head block.
panels.title: Time Bounds

panels.description: Total number of appended samples.
panels.title: Samples Appended

panels.description: Total number of chunks in the head block.
panels.title: Chunks in Head

panels.description: Total number of chunks created/removed in the head
panels.title: Chunks Churn

panels.description: Number of currently active appender transactions.
panels.title: Active Appenders

panels.description: Total number of head truncations attempted.
panels.title: Truncations

panels.description: Total number of head truncations that failed.
panels.title: Failed Truncations

panels.description: Total number of requests for series that were not found.
panels.title: Series Not Found

panels.description: Total number of appended out of order samples.
panels.title: Samples Out of Order

panels.description: Current number of targets in this scrape pool.
panels.title: Targets per Job

panels.description: Actual interval to sync the scrape pool.
panels.title: Sync Interval

panels.description: Total number of samples rejected due to duplicate timestamps but different values.
panels.title: Duplicate Rejected

panels.description: Total number of samples rejected due to not being out of the expected order.
panels.title: Samples Out of Order

panels.description: Total number of exemplar rejected due to not being out of the expected order.
panels.title: Exemplars Out of Order

panels.description: Total number of scrapes that hit the sample limit and were rejected.
panels.title: Sample Limit Hits

panels.description: Metric metadata in the cache for target scraping.
panels.title: Metadata Cache

panels.description: How many times a scrape cache was flushed due to getting big while scrapes are failing.
panels.title: Cache Force Flushes

panels.description: Total number of samples rejected due to timestamp falling outside of the time bounds.
panels.title: Samples Out of Bounds

panels.description: Total number of target sync failures.
panels.title: Target Sync Failure

panels.description: Total number of scrapes that hit the body size limit
panels.title: Body Size Limit Hits

panels.description: Average number syncs executed on scrape pools between all jobs.
panels.title: Pool Syncs

panels.description: The duration for a rule to execute.
panels.title: Rule Execution Time

panels.description: The duration of rule group evaluations.
panels.title: Rule Group Evaluation Time

panels.description: Samples incoming/sent to Remote Storage
panels.title: Samples Rate

panels.description: The total number of bytes of data (not metadata) sent by the queue after compression. Note that when exemplars over remote write is enabled the exemplars included in a remote write request count towards this metric.
panels.title: Remote Sent Rate

panels.description: Duration of send calls to the remote storage.
panels.title: Send Batch Duration

panels.description: Highest timestamp that has come into the remote storage via the Appender interface.
panels.title: Appender Lag

panels.description: The duration (99th percentile) of Service Discovery scan/query/fetch requests.
panels.title: SD Latency (p99)

panels.description: The number of DNS-SD lookups.
panels.title: DNS-SD Lookups

panels.description: The current number of Zookeeper-treecache watcher goroutines.
panels.title: ZK Watchers

panels.description: Modification time of files for File Service Discovery.
panels.title: File SD mtime

panels.description: Page completion/flush rate.
panels.title: Page Completion/Flush Rate

panels.description: Duration (p99) of write log fsync.
panels.title: WAL fsync Duration

panels.description: Total number of write log truncations attempted.
panels.title: Truncations

panels.description: Total number of write log truncations that failed.
panels.title: Failed Truncations

panels.description: Total number of WAL corruptions.
panels.title: Corruptions

panels.description: Total number of write log writes that failed.
panels.title: Failed Writes

panels.description: Number of records read by the WAL watcher that resulted in an error when decoding.
panels.title: Watcher Records Failed

panels.description: The number of bytes that are currently used for local storage by all blocks.
panels.title: Local Storage

panels.description: Total number of checkpoint deletions attempted.
panels.title: Checkpoints Deleted

panels.description: Total number of checkpoint creations attempted.
panels.title: Checkpoints Created

panels.description: Number of currently loaded data blocks
panels.title: Data Blocks

panels.description: Total number of compactions done on overlapping blocks.
panels.title: Vertical Compactions

panels.description: Total number of checkpoint deletions that failed.
panels.title: Checkpoint Del Failures

panels.description: Total number of checkpoint creations that failed.
panels.title: Checkpoint Create Failures

panels.description: Lockfile state from previous execution: CLEAN (no lockfile), REPLACED (lockfile replaced), DISABLED (lockfile disabled).
panels.title: TSDB Clean Start

panels.description: Time taken to replay the data on disk.
panels.title: Replay Time

panels.description: Size of symbol table in memory for loaded blocks
panels.title: Symbol Table RAM

panels.description: Total number of memory-mapped chunk corruptions.
panels.title: MMap Corruptions

panels.description: Number of times the database failed to reloadBlocks block data from disk.
panels.title: Reload Failures

panels.description: Total number snapshot replays that failed.
panels.title: Snapshot Replay Errors

panels.description: Total number of out of order samples ingestion failed attempts with out of support enabled, but sample outside of time window.
panels.title: Samples Out of Time

panels.description: The number of times that blocks were deleted because the maximum time limit was exceeded.
panels.title: Time Retention Hits

panels.description: The number of times that blocks were deleted because the maximum number of bytes was exceeded.
panels.title: Size Retention Hits

panels.description: Max number of bytes to be retained in the tsdb blocks.
panels.title: Size Retention Limit

panels.description: Duration of compaction runs
panels.title: Compaction Duration

panels.description: Final size of chunks on their first compaction
panels.title: Compaction Chunk Size

panels.description: Final number of samples on their first compaction
panels.title: Compaction Chunk Samples

panels.description: Final time range of chunks on their first compaction
panels.title: Compaction Chunk Time Range

panels.description: Total number of triggered compactions for the partition.
panels.title: Triggered

panels.description: Total number of compactions that were executed for the partition.
panels.title: Executed

panels.description: Total number of compactions that failed for the partition.
panels.title: Failed

panels.description: Total number of skipped compactions due to disabled auto compaction.
panels.title: Skipped

panels.description: The time taken to recompact blocks to remove tombstones.
panels.title: Tombstone Cleanup Duration
